trans-unit.source: Contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Contém propriedades que são usadas para restringir o conjunto de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> objetos retornados por uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A SqlTrackingQueryOptions contains properties that are used to constrain the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method against the tracking data in a database used by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Um SqlTrackingQueryOptions contém propriedades que são usadas para restringir o conjunto de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objetos retornados pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método em relação aos dados de rastreamento em um banco de dados usado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> in the collection of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> must correspond to a workflow instance which has tracking data associated with it in the database that meets the conditions specified by the properties of the SqlTrackingQueryOptions.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>na coleção de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objetos retornados por uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>deve corresponder a uma instância de fluxo de trabalho que tem dados de rastreamento associados a ele no banco de dados que atenda às condições especificadas pelas propriedades do SqlTrackingQueryOptions.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial, uma instância de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>| Vazio <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>| Uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>| Uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic). | Esses valores especificam que uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>deve retornar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objeto para cada instância de fluxo de trabalho com dados no banco de dados de rastreamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Resets the properties of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref> to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Redefine as propriedades do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"> </xref> para seus valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial, uma instância de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>|An empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| These values specify that a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> should return a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object for every workflow instance that has tracking data in the database.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>| <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>.| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>| Vazio <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>| Uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic). | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>| Uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic). | Esses valores especificam que uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>deve retornar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objeto para cada instância de fluxo de trabalho com dados no banco de dados de rastreamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the upper limit of the time period that, together with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref:System.DateTime>que especifica o limite superior do período de tempo, junto com <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, é usado para restringir o conjunto de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> objetos retornados por uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and StatusMaxDateTime, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>Restringe o conjunto de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objetos retornados por uma chamada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para essas instâncias de fluxo de trabalho que</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> tenha o <xref:System.Type>especificado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, que tem o status especificado por você <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>durante o período especificado, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>e StatusMaxDateTime e que extraiu dados que corresponde a pelo menos um dos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>objetos especificados pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by StatusMaxDateTime is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DateTime>valor especificado por StatusMaxDateTime é inclusivo.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como o status de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho é correspondido, consulte o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se `WorkflowStatus` é definido como nulo, em seguida, `StatusMaxDateTime` e `StatusMinDateTime` são ignorados.

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: Todas as instâncias de fluxo de trabalho serão retornadas quando `GetWorkflows` é chamado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the upper limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DateTime>que especifica o limite superior do período de tempo usado para correspondência de instâncias de fluxo de trabalho com um status especificado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.DateTime> that, together with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref:System.DateTime>que, juntamente com <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, é usado para restringir o conjunto de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> objetos retornados por uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by StatusMinDateTime and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>Restringe o conjunto de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objetos retornados por uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>às instâncias de fluxo de trabalho que têm o <xref:System.Type>especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, que têm o status especificado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>durante o período especificado por StatusMinDateTime e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, e que extraiu dados que corresponde a pelo menos um dos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>objetos especificados pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> value specified by StatusMinDateTime is inclusive.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DateTime>valor especificado por StatusMinDateTime é inclusivo.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how the status of a workflow instance is matched, see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como o status de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho é correspondido, consulte o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If `WorkflowStatus` is set to null, then `StatusMaxDateTime` and `StatusMinDateTime` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se `WorkflowStatus` é definido como nulo, em seguida, `StatusMaxDateTime` e `StatusMinDateTime` são ignorados.

trans-unit.source: All workflow instances will be returned when `GetWorkflows` is called.
trans-unit.target: Todas as instâncias de fluxo de trabalho serão retornadas quando `GetWorkflows` é chamado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the lower limit of the time period used for matching workflow instances with a status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DateTime>que especifica o limite inferior do período de tempo usado para correspondência de instâncias de fluxo de trabalho com um status especificado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus*> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of data extract values which are used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma lista de valores de extração de dados que são usados para restringir o conjunto de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> objetos retornados por uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by TrackingDataItems.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>Restringe o conjunto de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objetos retornados por uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>às instâncias de fluxo de trabalho que têm o <xref:System.Type>especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, que têm o status especificado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>durante o período especificado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, e que extraiu dados que correspondem a pelo menos uma da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>objetos especificados pelo TrackingDataItems.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> can contain <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> records that contain data that is extracted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>pode conter <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>registros que contêm dados extraídos do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The TrackingDataItems property contains <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects that specify certain values for this extracted data.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade TrackingDataItems contém <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>objetos que especifique determinados valores para extraiu dados.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow instance meets the other criteria specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> and TrackingDataItems is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the extracted data stored in the database for a workflow instance must match one or more of the extracted data values specified by the TrackingDataItems property for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object to be returned for the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Se a instância de fluxo de trabalho atende aos critérios especificados pela <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>e TrackingDataItems não é uma referência nula (`Nothing`), os dados extraídos armazenados no banco de dados para uma instância de fluxo de trabalho devem corresponder a um ou mais dos valores de dados extraídos especificado pela propriedade TrackingDataItems para um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objeto a ser retornado para a instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: If TrackingDataItems is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by the values of the extracted data for any of the workflow instances in the database.
trans-unit.target: Se TrackingDataItems for uma referência nula (`Nothing`), o conjunto de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objetos retornados não serão limitados pelos valores dos dados extraídos para qualquer uma das instâncias de fluxo de trabalho no banco de dados.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue"></xref> objects that contains specified values to be matched for data extracted from the workflow instance or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue"> </xref> especificado de objetos que contém valores a serem correspondidos para dados extraídos da instância do fluxo de trabalho ou uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"></xref> value that is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"> </xref> valor que é usado para restringir o conjunto de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> objetos retornados por uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, that have the status specified by WorkflowStatus during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>Restringe o conjunto de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objetos retornados por uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>às instâncias de fluxo de trabalho que têm o <xref:System.Type>especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A>, que têm o status especificado por WorkflowStatus durante o período especificado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, e que extraiu dados que corresponde a pelo menos um dos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>objetos especificados pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowType%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance is considered to have a status that matches WorkflowStatus if the last <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> received for that workflow instance before or during the specified time period has its <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property set to a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> value that maps to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName> value specified by WorkflowStatus.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de fluxo de trabalho é considerada como tendo um status que corresponde a WorkflowStatus se a última <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>recebida para essa instância de fluxo de trabalho antes ou durante o período de tempo tem seu <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade definida como um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>valor que é mapeado para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>valor especificado pelo WorkflowStatus.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.TrackingWorkflowEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow instance must have a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> that is configured for the appropriate <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName> value.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>do fluxo de trabalho instância deve ter um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>que está configurado para apropriada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName>valor.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Only <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that have been sent in workflow tracking records can be matched.
trans-unit.target: Somente <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>valores que foram enviados em registros de controle de fluxo de trabalho podem ser correspondidos.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: If no workflow tracking records have been sent for the workflow instance, the workflow instance is considered to have a status of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum registro de controle de fluxo de trabalho foram enviado para a instância de fluxo de trabalho, a instância de fluxo de trabalho será considerada para ter um status de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the mapping between <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> values.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra o mapeamento entre <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>valores e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>valores.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: |TrackingWorkflowEvent value|WorkflowStatus value| |---------------------------------|--------------------------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>|<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| If WorkflowStatus is null (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by status; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: | O valor de TrackingWorkflowEvent | O valor de WorkflowStatus | |---------------------------------|--------------------------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>| Se o WorkflowStatus é nulo (`Nothing`), o conjunto de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objetos retornados não serão limitados pelo status; em outras palavras, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objeto será retornado para qualquer instância de fluxo de trabalho que corresponde aos parâmetros especificados por outras propriedades do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"></xref> values or null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"> </xref> valores nulos ou (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The default is null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: O padrão é null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the workflow instance <xref:System.Type> that is used to constrain the set of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a instância de fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>que é usado para restringir o conjunto de <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> objetos retornados por uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> constrains the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to those workflow instances that have the <xref:System.Type> specified by WorkflowType, that have the status specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> during the period specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, and that have extracted data that matches at least one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> objects specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>Restringe o conjunto de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objetos retornados por uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>às instâncias de fluxo de trabalho que têm o <xref:System.Type>especificado por WorkflowType, que têm o status especificado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A>durante o período especificado por <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A>, e que extraiu dados que corresponde a pelo menos um dos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue>objetos especificados pelo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.TrackingDataItems%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItemValue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMaxDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.StatusMinDateTime%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions.WorkflowStatus%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>

trans-unit.source: If WorkflowType is a null reference (`Nothing`), the set of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects returned will not be constrained by workflow <xref:System.Type>; in other words, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> object will be returned for any workflow instance that matches the parameters specified by the other properties of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Se WorkflowType for uma referência nula (`Nothing`), o conjunto de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objetos retornados não serão limitados pelo fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Type>em outras palavras, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objeto que será retornado para qualquer instância de fluxo de trabalho que corresponde os parâmetros especificados por outras propriedades do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The default is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).
